info.name: EDULIVES - Teacher API
info.description: API collection for the Teacher module in EDULIVES application

request.description: Retrieves the teacher's profile information
Updates the teacher's profile information

formdata.value: Two-week intensive workshop on modern teaching methodologies

request.description: Adds a professional development record to the teacher's profile
Retrieves all classes and subjects assigned to the teacher
Retrieves the list of students in a specific class and section
Creates a new chapter plan for a subject
Retrieves all chapter plans for a specific class, section, and subject
Retrieves the teacher's timetable
Requests a substitution for a specific class period
Retrieves all substitution requests made by the teacher
Retrieves the academic calendar events relevant to the teacher
Marks attendance for a class on a specific date
Retrieves attendance records for a class on a specific date
Generates an attendance report for a class over a date range

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Algebra Practice Problems",
    "description": "Solve the following 10 algebraic equations",
    "class": "10",
    "section": "A",
    "subject": "Mathematics",
    "dueDate": "2023-09-20"
}

request.description: Creates a new assignment for a class
Retrieves all assignments created by the teacher
Retrieves all submissions for a specific assignment
Grades a student's assignment submission
Creates a new exam for a class
Retrieves all exams created by the teacher
Enters results for an exam
Generates a performance report for an exam

formdata.value: Lesson plan covering the basics of quadratic equations and their applications

request.description: Submits a lesson plan for HOD approval
Retrieves all lesson plans submitted by the teacher

formdata.value: Additional practice problems for algebraic equations

request.description: Uploads a teaching resource
Retrieves all resources uploaded by the teacher
Retrieves all resources shared within the teacher's department

formdata.value: I wanted to discuss your approach to the algebra problems in the last assignment.

request.description: Sends a message to a student or parent
Retrieves all messages received by the teacher
Retrieves all messages sent by the teacher

formdata.value: There will be a quiz on quadratic equations next Monday. Please prepare chapters 5-7.

request.description: Posts an announcement to a class
Retrieves all announcements posted by the teacher
Schedules a meeting with parents or other staff members
Retrieves all meetings scheduled by the teacher
Records or updates a student's performance in a subject
Retrieves a student's performance records for a specific subject
Adds a behavioral observation for a student

request.description: Creates an intervention plan for a student who needs additional support

item.name: 10. Project and Activity Management

formdata.value: Students will work in groups to create a science project demonstrating principles of physics

request.description: Creates a new class project or group activity
Retrieves all projects created by the teacher
Retrieves details of a specific project

body.raw:
{
    "studentId": "{{studentId}}",
    "description": "Prepared the experimental setup and collected data",
    "date": "2023-10-15",
    "evaluationScore": 85,
    "feedback": "Excellent work on data collection. The experimental setup was well-designed."
}

request.description: Records a student's contribution to a project
Retrieves all student contributions for a specific project

formdata.value: Won first place in the district science olympiad competition

request.description: Records an extracurricular achievement for a student

item.description: APIs for managing class projects and student activities

item.name: 11. Parent Interaction Management

request.description: Retrieves all scheduled parent-teacher meetings

body.raw:
{
    "parentId": "{{parentId}}",
    "studentId": "{{studentId}}",
    "date": "2023-10-10",
    "communicationType": "Phone Call",
    "subject": "Academic Progress Discussion",
    "details": "Discussed student's recent improvement in mathematics and areas that still need attention",
    "outcome": "Parent agreed to provide additional support at home",
    "followUpRequired": true,
    "followUpDate": "2023-10-24"
}

request.description: Records a communication with a parent
Retrieves communication history with a specific parent

body.raw:
{
    "parentId": "{{parentId}}",
    "studentId": "{{studentId}}",
    "date": "2023-10-12",
    "communicationType": "Meeting",
    "subject": "Behavioral Concern",
    "details": "Parent expressed concern about student's difficulty focusing in class",
    "outcome": "Agreed to monitor behavior more closely and provide weekly updates",
    "followUpRequired": true,
    "followUpDate": "2023-10-19"
}

request.description: Documents a concern raised by a parent
Adds follow-up information to a documented concern

formdata.value: I'm pleased to report significant improvement in your child's mathematics performance this month. Test scores have increased by 15%, and classroom participation has been excellent.

request.description: Sends a progress update to a parent

item.description: APIs for managing interactions with parents

item.name: 12. Feedback System

request.description: Submits a suggestion for academic improvement

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Geometry Modeling Kit",
    "description": "Request for 10 geometry modeling kits to help students visualize 3D shapes",

    "purpose": "To enhance understanding of 3D geometry concepts through hands-on learning",
    "targetDate": "2023-11-01",
    "estimatedCost": 500
}

request.description: Requests resources or permissions for activities
Retrieves all resource requests made by the teacher
Provides feedback on curriculum and assessment methods
Retrieves all curriculum feedback provided by the teacher

item.description: APIs for providing feedback and requesting resources
